summary: This module contains a collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of CKAN's search utilities, including package indexing operations, configuration-driven handling of local Solr parameters, schema version checks, and the retrieval of the appropriate query parser.
business_intent: Validate that the search subsystem correctly processes package data, respects configuration constraints on Solr local parameters, and enforces schema compatibility, thereby ensuring reliable search functionality within the CKAN platform.
